solution_line_template: Luke sleeps {luke_more_than_connor} hours longer than Connor who sleeps {connor_sleep} hours so that’s {luke_more_than_connor}+{connor_sleep} = <<{luke_more_than_connor}+{connor_sleep}={luke_sleep}>>{luke_sleep} hours
The new puppy sleeps twice as long as Luke, who sleeps {luke_sleep} hours, so the puppy sleeps {puppy_multiplier}*{luke_sleep} = <<{puppy_multiplier}*{luke_sleep}={puppy_sleep}>>{puppy_sleep} hours
